message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  This gives you something and avoids us risking it all.
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to do this.
I'm being more than fair, Bob. Take this deal before inflation eats away at your potential gains even more!
This is my final offer. If you reject it, we both lose more money.
Bob, I'm meeting you in the middle. This is a good deal for both of us. Don't let greed make us both losers.
